  • Album Info:
    Artist:     M.I.A.
    Album: Bells Collection
    Release Date: December 25th, 2023
    Distribution: Exclusive release on Ohmni.com as a 36MB mp3 mixtape
    Track Handling: Separated tracks with names inspired by content/lyrics
    Formats: Provided mp3 and flac versions (flac is redundant due to the low quality, it's just the format I was working in when I cut the tracks)
    Description: M.I.A.'s Christmas mixtape was distributed solely on Ohmni.com. Tracks are individually named based on content, with both mp3 and flac versions available. The artwork for the tracks was likewise posted and is included in the album.

  • Audio Info
    Format:     MPEG Audio
    Format version: Version 1
    Format profile: Layer 3
    Format settings: Joint stereo / MS Stereo
    Duration: 41 min 13 s
    Bit rate mode: Constant
    Bit rate: 128 kb/s
    Channel(s): 2 channels
    Sampling rate: 44.1 kHz
    Frame rate: 38.281 FPS (1152 SPF)
    Compression mode: Lossy
item.author: markmathers
